Description: Book of the Dead of Tasheretenmin in many fragments mounted in four frames, in hieratic script. Drawn vignettes.
Curator's comments: Mosher, Malcom Jr. 2016. The Book of the Dead, Saite through Ptolemaic periods : a study of traditions evident in versions of texts and vignettes (SPBD Studies), vol. I (BD Spells 1-15) and II (BD Spells 16, 18-30), Charleston. To be studied by Mahmoud Ibrahim, Egyptology department, New Valley University, Egypt.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (381260) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/381260)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: displaced fragments, frayed, friable, fragments not hinged to glass Black ink Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: masking tape (unsuitable) Object Priority: C Mount Priority: D Overall Condition: D
